name: the-socioeconomic-class-of-robots-in-films
title: the socioeconomic class of robots in films
description:
A discussion over the difficulty of understanding and measuring diversity led to explanations using robots in films.

This is a list of some robots in some films along with their socioeconomic class.

The dataset is collaboratively maintained, pull requests are welcomed.

resources.name: A list of some robots in some films with their socieconomic class
resources.description: A list of some robots in some films with their socioeconomic class using the informal classifications on the WIkipedia page for the social structure of the United Kingdom https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_structure_of_the_United_Kingdom#Informal_classifications_and_stereotypes.
